name: 3dDTtoNoisyDWI
author: AFNI Developers
description: Generate a synthetic set of DWI measures with a given SNR from an AFNI-style DT file and a set of gradients. This can be useful for simulations and testing.

inputs.description: Diffusion tensor file with six bricks of DT components ordered in the AFNI manner: Dxx,Dxy,Dyy,Dxz,Dyz,Dzz.
inputs.name: DT file

inputs.description: Text file of gradients arranged in three columns. There should be no row of all zeros representing the b=0 line.
inputs.name: Gradient file

inputs.description: Fractional value of noise in DWIs. FF = sigma/S0 = 1/SNR0. For example, FF=0.05 corresponds to SNR0=20.
inputs.name: Noise fraction in DWI

inputs.description: Optional fraction of Rician noise in the b=0 reference image. If not provided, FF2=FF.
inputs.name: Noise fraction in B0

inputs.description: Output file name prefix. Will have N+1 bricks when GRADFILE has N rows of gradients.
inputs.name: Output file prefix

inputs.description: Optional mask within which to calculate uncertainty. Data should be masked already otherwise.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Optional DW factor to use if DT values are scaled to something physical. Default is BB=1.
inputs.name: B-value factor

inputs.description: Optional reference b=0 signal strength. Default value is SS=1000.
inputs.name: Reference b=0 signal strength

output-files.description: Synthetic set of DWI measures with noise. Contains N+1 bricks mimicking B0+DWI data.
output-files.name: Output DWI file
